activities:
SoGoSurvey is an application service provider that provides online survey tools to its clients to conduct two-way communications with its customers, employees, suppliers and constituents.

SoGoSurvey collects information about both, its customers and the individuals who participate in, or are invited to participate in, any of the surveys. SoGoSurvey purely collects information under the direction of its customers on its service platform and has no direct relationship with the individuals whose personal data it processes. 

Data collected by SoGoSurvey customers are owned and accessed by customers alone. SoGoSurvey's access to customers' data is restricted to explicit consent form customers and only in the case of providing help and support.

SoGoSurvey employees working with clients are regularly trained and are aware of the data privacy policies governing the access of clients' data.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: organization, client and data that client collects online through our service platform or data that they enter directly into our service platform.
